item.title: Crucial’s X10 4TB Portable SSD Returns to Its Prime Day Low After a Brief Price Hike, Only $0.05 per GB
item.content:encoded:
It’s rare that a tech deal approaches perfection as closely as this one that’s just popped up at Amazon. That might sound hyperbolic, but how else would you describe this all-time low price on the Crucial X10 4TB SSD, which is one of the most complete portable drives in terms of physical size (tiny and lightweight), memory (huge), and speed (blazing)?

Amazon’s dropped the price on this all-star portable hard drive by 39% to an unprecedented $240. The Crucial X10’s appeal is multiplied when you take into account that it’s compatible with Windows, Mac, Android, iPad, Linux, and gaming consoles. Need more? It’s also IP65 dust and water resistant, and probably most importantly of all considering it’s modest size, the Crucial X10 is also drop-resistant up to nearly 10 feet.

See at Amazon

Something for Everyone

When a portable SSD has nearly universal compatibility to go along with all of its many outstanding features, it also gains nearly universal appeal. Creative professionals like photo and video shooters and editors love the massive 4TB capacity, but they might love the truly outstanding 2,100MB/s read and 2,000MB/s write speeds that blast through even the biggest files in no time flat. The size and speed also make it a perfect source of extra storage for gaming consoles, and anyone just looking for a big, fast, reliable drive that will keep everything backed up and won’t take over their desk space will be thrilled by the Crucial X10.

Who else is this drive designed for? Students, for sure, since it’s big enough to keep all of those important files backed up and safe while also taking up next to no backpack space. Families with thousands of irreplaceable digital photos and home videos can fit all of them in the generous 4TB capacity of the Crucial X10 to keep them safe. The better question is, who isn’t the Crucial X10 designed for?

Deal Become Steal

While you’re more than welcome to keep the Crucial X10 on your desk fulltime, or keep it in a drawer to pull out for regular backups, it’s practically begging to be taken on the go. It’s really small — 2.55 inches wide by 1.96 long by 0.39 thick, and a truly ridiculous 1.13 ounces — not pounds. It’s literally pocket-sized, or an ideal addition to a camera bag.

The 4TB version of the Crucial X10 portable drive — it’s also available in 1TB, 2TB, 6TB, and 8TB versions — normally sells for $396, and to be honest, that’s a very fair price for a compact, fast, reliable portable hard drive that’s also tough enough to take a good-sized drop. This 39% off deal at Amazon is the biggest one ever for this highly rated drive, bringing it to an all-time low price of just $240.

item.title: Forget Black Friday, DJI RS 3 Mini 3-Axis Gimbal Stabilizer for Cameras Hits Its Lowest Price Ever
item.content:encoded:
Amazon’s two-day sales even Prime Big Deals Days just ended. On October 7 and October, you could find crazy good deals all across the giant online retailer’s website covering pretty much every category of products. Even though the even is over, you can still find a ton of great opportunities to save. If you’re a photographer or videographer, you can elevate their game when shooting with a gimbal stabilizer. This RS 3 Mini 3-axis gimbal from DJI is still on sale past Prime Big Deals Days. It’s normally listed tat $237, but right now Amazon has it cut down by 20%. That shaves off $48, bring what you pay down to just $189.

See at Amazon

Wide-Ranging Compatibility

This isn’t a gimbal designed for use with phones. This is professional-grade gear made with shooting on a DSLR camera in mind. With its strong high-torque motors, the DJI RS 3 Mini can support a load capacity of up to 4.4 lbs. (or 2kg). It works with a number of Canon, Sony, Panasonic, Nikon, and Fujifilm cameras. Check out the product page for the full list of models to see if your specific camera is compatible.

The gimbal implements a pro-level RS stabilization algorithm to keep your shot from shakings even when shooting at low angles or when filming in flashlight mode. It supports native vertical shooting, great for when creating content to be used on social media. The quick-release plate can just be set to the vertical arm and you’re good to go.

The handle on the DJI RS 3 Mini gimbal stabilizer has a number of controls built into the handle including a Bluetooth shutter control. Once you’ve paired it the first time, your camera will automatically connect when both are one and close by. From there, you can easily control photo capture, video recording, and even zoom right from the gimbal controls.

Designed to be portable, the stabilizer is light and small so you can easily store it into you bag. The whole gimbal only weighs 1.75 lbs. (or 795g).

Battery life is long-lasting. You’ll get a full 10 hours of shooting done off a single charge. When reaches 0%, you can get it back up to full after just 2.5 hours of charging.

Included with the gimbal, you receive a couple of mounting screws, a USB-charging cable, an L-shaped Multi-camera control cable (USB-C), the RS mini quick release plate, and an RS mini tripod. The last one can be screwed into the bottom of the gimbal for when you need a stationary shot.

See at Amazon

item.title: Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) Both Wi-Fi Only and Cellular-Enabled Models Stay at Prime Day Low Pricing
item.content:encoded:
Hoping to get into the gym more often? Maybe you want to get better nights of sleep. The best way to improve your gym-going or sleep habits and hit your goals in one thing — data. Tracking your progress is a surefire way to see an improvement to your performance. Set goals for yourself that you can actually measure and you can do that with the right smart watch. Right now, Amazon has the Apple Watch SE on sale for 32% off. The watch from Apple normally goes for $249, but the discount cuts the price down by $79. That means you only have to pay $170 for a limited time.

Those price points are for the 40mm model. If you’re hoping to score the larger 44mm model, you’re in luck. That one which is usually set at $279 is also $79 off for a limited time, which brings the price down to an even $200.

See at Amazon

The Apple Watch SE will allow you to call and text without your iPhone with the cellular-enabled models. The 40mm cellular Apple Watch SE is down from $299 to just $220 while the 44mm model is down from $329 to $220 as well so you can get either size for the same price.

This second-generation Apple Watch SE features has an OLED Retina display that’s easy to read under any lighting conditions. Even in direct sunlight, the 1,000 nits of brightness will keep everything on screen perfectly legible.

Personal Fitness Coach

To help you along with your training, the Apple Watch SE will track all of your activities. You can monitor your heart rate, log workouts in the Health app, track your steps every day. You’ll come to realize how addictive staying in shape can be when you start closing those rings every day. It’s like maintaining a streak in Duolingo or Wordle. The watch also has a number of emergency features that could save your life like Detection, Crash Detection, and Emergency SOS.

Track you sleep with the Sleep app so you can gain a deep understanding of your sleep cycle. The watch can identify and differentiate which times throughout the night you are awake, in core sleep, or in REM sleep.

The watch is swim proof at up to 50m of water resistance. You can even get some laps in at your gym’s pools or use it for an upcoming triathlon.

Choose between a variety of colors when you get yourself the second-gen Apple Watch SE for as low as $170.
